org.springframework.integration.support.management

Interface PollableChannelManagement

  • All Superinterfaces:
    DisposableBean, IntegrationManagement, IntegrationStatsManagement, MessageChannelMetrics
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    QueueChannelManagement
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractPollableChannel, PollableAmqpChannel, PollableJmsChannel, PriorityChannel, QueueChannel, RendezvousChannel

    public interface PollableChannelManagement
extends MessageChannelMetrics
    Metrics for pollable channels.

    4.2
    Author:
